summary_md: Liechtenstein, a principality in Central Europe, maintains a high standard of living with a GDP per capita (167,187 USD per person) and a life expectancy (84.84 years). The country has a high internet user penetration rate (97.30%).

sections.economy_md: The GDP per capita (167,187 USD per person) indicates a strong economic position for Liechtenstein.
sections.labor_md: With a life expectancy (84.84 years), the labor force in Liechtenstein enjoys a high quality of life.
sections.digital_md: The internet user penetration rate (97.30%) reflects the country's advanced digital infrastructure.
sections.health_env_md: The life expectancy (84.84 years) suggests a favorable health environment in Liechtenstein.
